p: The interactive meeting comprised a review of gaps in epidemiologic data among PWID and a formal presentation on SI limitations and population size estimate approaches, followed by panel discussions addressing (1) PWID community involvement in SI collection and use and (2) challenges/solutions to indicator choices and use of programmatic data to inform indicators from an implementers’ perspective. Meeting participants then divided into four groups to discuss gaps and potential solutions to SI content relevant to PWID (Table 1). The proceedings were transcribed, and main points are summarized in this article; no other documents were produced.
